title: Resilient Drylands: Innovating for Sustainable Agricultural Landscapes and Livelihoods

tasks.task: Participating in a webinar on Resilient Drylands Innovating for Sustainable Agricultural Landscape and Livelihoods.
subtasks: Welcoming participants and introducing the webinar.
Setting the stage with technical perspectives.
Presenting FAO's initiatives and partner roles.
Discussing soil health and crop nutrition in drylands.
Sharing on-the-ground experiences from the dry corridor.
Answering participants' questions and closing remarks.
